reference.title: Activity Selection dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to select the activity within the specified Android project that is to be launched. This dialog appears when you click Browse next to the Activity field on the Main tab of an Android Application using Studio for Android run configuration.

section.p: This dialog displays the set of activities encapsulated within the current project. Select the desired activity and click OK. Note that if the Default activity option is selected on the Main tab of the Run Configurations dialog, the Activity field is ignored and thus you cannot reach this dialog.
